import React from "react" import styles from './Card.module.scss' function Card(props) { const [isAdded, setIsAdded] = React.useState(false) const onClickPlus = () => { setIsAdded(!isAdded) } const [isFavorite, setIsFavorite] = React.useState(false) return (
{props.title}
Цена: {props.price}
) } export default Card
